default.description: Defines if this email is the main phone number. In an array of emails, only one will have this value to TRUE.

type.description: This value will be used to define a group of emails. Multiple emails will be able to have the same type. e.g.: Business, Home, ...

name.description: This value will be used to identify this specific email into the group. e.g.: type = business and name = support, type = business and name = administration
